question: My daughter has Type 1 Diabetes and has had it for 30 yrs and is now facing Breast Cancer treatment. She has had surgery already and she is not sure of her feelings on the effects of her choices and the effects it will have with her Diabetes. She is 33 yrs old and has been under good control. Has anyone expierienced similar situation, and can share their expierence.
title: Diabetes and Breast Cancer
